attributes.action: , in the cause of the literacy of the nation and the nation itself, stand down immediately and hold a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sadly, Mr. Bown is not just a bungler, but, worse still, a delusional bungler who, ironically, sees himself as one of the heroes he manages to find time to write about. His delusion has meant that the global financial crisis is having a severer impact on Britain than on many other developed countries. His bungling of a letter of condolence for another young life wasted in Afghanistan is surely the last straw.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
